tweet: prepping for google summer of code ðŸŒ¸ just pushed updated contribution docs. we don't just want users, we want builders. if you're looking to ship real features to thousands of users this summer, the repo is open. come say hi.

image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee mascot handing a glowing pixel seed to a tiny new developer character. reasoning: Signals active open-source governance and invites talent. Shifts focus from just consuming AI to building it, reinforcing the community-driven brand identity.
